:: Wolfgang ::

:: Takes his first step outside and marvels at the horrible beauty of planet
Earth. ::

Hello, my old friend.

:: Wolfgang grabs at this left thigh weapon holster and pulls out a small
contraption.  Aims at a tree and "fires".  Wolfgang hears nothing but a
small beep. ::

What the......

:: Wolfgang inspects the contraption to find that it is a small radar type
machine. ::

Damn.  I must of picked it up when i was searching for a gun.  Oh well.

:: Keeps on walking. ::
